caseStudies.title: ISX Innovations Product Launch
caseStudies.challenge: Organize a secure product reveal for high-value clients while maintaining rigorous security protocols and seamless technical execution.
caseStudies.solution: Implemented multi-layer security coordination, custom LED display configuration for proprietary content delivery, and real-time encrypted live streaming to remote offices.
results: Zero security incidents throughout the event

caseStudies.title: Statewide Workforce Summit
caseStudies.challenge: Coordinate a multi-agency statewide summit with strict compliance requirements, ADA accessibility standards, and live interpretation services.
caseStudies.solution: Deployed comprehensive event management including full accessibility infrastructure, simultaneous interpretation, secure documentation protocols, and cross-agency logistics coordination.

caseStudies.title: Advanced Surgical Education Symposium
caseStudies.challenge: Deliver premium AV quality for complex surgical demonstrations in a hybrid format with simultaneous live streaming to 45 remote clinics while maintaining strict privacy protocols.
caseStudies.solution: Installed broadcast-grade 4K camera systems with surgical detail enhancement, dedicated streaming infrastructure for healthcare-grade encryption, and privacy-compliant zone management.
results: Seamless hybrid experience for all participants
2.4K+ remote attendees achieved 98% session completion rate
